spotifyr 1.1.0
  • Reference

Get track uri:s from a string search on Spotify

Source: R/get_tracks.R
get_tracks.Rd

This function takes a string and returns a data frame with track information from Spotify's search endpoint

get_tracks(track_name, artist_name = NULL, album_name = NULL,
  return_closest_track = FALSE, access_token = get_spotify_access_token())

Arguments

track_name

A string with track name
artist_name

Optional. A string with artist name
album_name

Optional. A string with album name
return_closest_track

Optional. A string with album name
access_token

Spotify Web API token. Defaults to spotifyr::get_spotify_access_token()

Examples

# NOT RUN {
##### Get track uri for Radiohead - Kid A
kid_a <- get_tracks(artist_name = "Radiohead", track_name = "Kid A", return_closest_track = TRUE)
# }
